raw_text: AL HAJ MOHAMED MOHAMED KALEEL – (Chairman of Jewelarts Group of Companies and Chairman of Kollupitiya Jumma Masjid) passed away on the 6th August 2023. He was the beloved husband of Hajiani Fathima Ayna Kaleel,​ much loved father of Nishreen,​ Ahamed,​ Akif and Nushrath,​ father-in-law of Ishan,​ Hiraz,​ Dilani and Ayman,​ loving brother of Marhoom Mohamed Zawahir,​ Mohamed Hilmy,​ Mohamed Izzath Mohamed Zahool,​ Enya Shaheed,​ Feroza Muzammil & Azha Shanawaz. Burial was done at Jawatte Jumma Masjid after the Janaza prayers conducted at Colpetty Jumma Mosque on the 6th August 2023.051228

WEBSTER – MERVYN – Beloved husband of Sheila,​ father of Gordon,​ Norman and Gillian,​ father-in-law of Michelle,​ Virginia and Jeremy,​ brother-in-law of late George and of Marie and Valerie,​ beloved grandfather of Tamara,​ Nigel,​ Tiffany,​ Brittany and Hamish,​ great grandfather of Silas,​ passed away peacefully at the age of 99 on the 10th of August 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Monday,​ the 21st of August,​ from 10.00 a.m. to 2.45 p.m. followed by a Service. Cortege leaves Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Old Crematorium).051557
